name: Bell Ringer
description: Bell Ringer is a fast paced arena PvP brawler with local and online multiplayer. Gather your friends and brace yourselves for some intense brawling! Choose between five unique characters with different weapons, special moves and styles.

reviews.review_text: Bell Ringer is an indie platform figher game in the likes of Smash Bros, but with a much darker tone.  This game use Unreal 4 (game not for low PC)  As with any brawler it takes some time to get the hang of each characters playstyle and find your favorite fighter. All characters are unique enough and have their own weapons and special attacks.  The game offers bots with varied difficulty, and also online multiplayer (but havn't gotten around to try that out yet).  The sound effects are good and the music is very fitting to the games atmosphere.
Really good game, some characters just ♥♥♥♥ up others, which is totally balanced.  *FATAL ERROR* <--Pops up every now and then. Still Gucci.
I ripped my ♥♥♥♥ off about eighteen times playing this with my friend. Save yourself the trouble, run while you still can.

Only a few people, tried it with a friend, and the game was rigged for the host. Only 1-2 attacks would actually deal damage. My friend would stop moving, I would attack, and not a single hit was detected. Meanwhile, all of his attacks dealt major damage or one hit killed me. Glad I got this for free and didn't pay.

'Bell Ringer is a fast paced arena PvP brawler' Quite honestly I can't see what's fast paced about this game. I beat the singleplayer campaign in 13 minutes, after finishing a single level with a character, and instantly changing afterwards. The animations feel slow, and the combat seems halfassed. If this is the developers first try at making a game then It's not actually too bad, however the game feels unfinished. I won't lie, I haven't tried the multiplayer, which this game is mostly about, but with the outlook of the fighting mechanics, I think I won't anyway. I wouldn't recommend this game, however if you're not too picky with your games and want a quick 5-10 minute game I won't judge. Just don't get your hopes up for staying with this game for long.

This would be decent for a college project. But its trash for a product being sold. One of the worst 'finished' 3-d brawlers I have ever played. Game is hideous. Animations are awkward. 'Full' controller support is only full when it feels like it. Optimization does not exist; my gpu fan should not be working this hard for a game this simple.  Also multiplayer is dead. Only get if you want a ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ game for laughs with buddies in local co-op.

Bell Ringer is a game targeted towards online multiplayer arenas.  This is all well and good except for the fact that nobody plays multiplayer. I never once found a server I could join.  The graphics are poor, and the single player mode is terrible. I got this game for free. the only good I got out of it was the free trading cards. Dont buy, its not fun.
